title: 13 champs over 1000 days w/o new skins
body:
Edit: Before someone says it, yes there are 14 champs here. I messed up in my Excel file where I keep track of this stuff and Rek'Sai was somehow farther down on the list. Bear with the title as you can't change it when it's posted. Mistakes can happen.

Yeah it's another one of these posts. Haven't done one in a while so why not post something a little different outside of the whole PAX and Klein hate going on right now (I'm still with the community though that we shouldn't let this just blow over like Riot wants and I've recently shared my thoughts, but hey got to try something to keep whatever love I have left for this game alive before it flatlines finally).

List is as follows:

* {{champion:74}}  1512 days
* {{champion:32}} {{champion:77}} 1251 days
* {{champion:72}} {{champion:101}} 1225 days
* {{champion:9}} 1222 days
* {{champion:26}} 1211 days
* {{champion:35}} {{champion:82}} 1201 days
* {{champion:421}}  1166 days
* {{champion:266}} 1138 days
* {{champion:20}} 1064 days
* {{champion:54}} 1061 days
* {{champion:38}} 1054 days

({{champion:39}} would be listed but her skin is releasing sometime this week most likely so I left her off)

100 Day threshold (champs within 100 days of going 1000 days over)

* {{champion:37}} 937 days
* {{champion:7}}  907 days

And to reiterate on these posts: this is just for the sake of data and view of time. Champs that are in need of reworks (Fidd & Mord) are more than likely to be held off from skins until reworked. Champs that are in the works for new skins will also be held off but should be considered for them in the future after they hit.

---

In closing: list is fortunately shorter and we should expect Heim and Amumu in the coming patches. As well, Urgot finally got his skin and the list is ever so slowly getting shorter. Whoo I guess. Normally I'd be ecstatic that it's finally here but considering the situation of PAX and Klein with the community in the last few days, it's just getting me down.

replies.body:
Heimerdinger coming up this year. Amumu coming up this year. Sona appeared in my .wad file digging several months ago so I'm guessing she has something coming. And one of LB's voice actresses (not English, I think it was Spanish?) mentioned working on something for LB so she's possibly getting a legendary soonish.

Hopefully Nunu and Aatrox get something soon. Aside from Xerath and Kassadin (the latter of whom is still in need of an update of some sort), all the rest are medium to high priority VGU candidates.
Most people though the Sona WAD file was related to her Guinn Chroma. Which, it may or may not.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=28lqub4V,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-09-04T18:19:43.184+0000)
>
> Most people though the Sona WAD file was related to her Guinn Chroma. Which, it may or may not.

No other champ who got a golden chroma got stuck in .wads
That's what I said, so it's gotta be something else.

{{champion:74}} {{champion:32}} have both been confirmed for skins this year (along with {{champion:240}} as well). So we just gotta keep waiting and seeing when they come out.

{{champion:266}} his update came out in June, so he wasn't eligible for skins before that. So just gotta wait till he gets one now. 

{{champion:20}} just literally had his update, so he's back on list for getting a skin sometime.

{{champion:82}} is one that's been said to be a high priority on the VGU list and they'd be surprised if he didn't get his VGU in 2019. So it's almost certain that he'll be there and thus won't see any skins till after that.

{{champion:35}} is another I'd say they are probably holding off on since his last skin was only a 750 and he's getting pretty outdated to the point that there's only so much they can do without having to just give him a Legendary or Ultimate by now.

As for the rest... they may or may not have something in the works. Only time will tell.
Wait, when did they say Kled was getting a skin? I know Heim and Amumu but when did they mention Kled?

On [Reddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/95codi/riot_skin_manager_even_though_their_play_rates/e3rylx9/)

"We still have skins coming for Kled, Amumu, Urgot and Heimerdinger, and we are totally looking at the other champions that have been mentioned in this thread for skins either this year or during 2019."
Prediction: Heimer will get a 975 skin then not get another skin for 4 years.

> [{quoted}](name=Jaspers,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=28lqub4V,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-09-04T08:41:36.428+0000)
>
> Prediction: Heimer will get a 975 skin then not get another skin for 4 years.

That's *if* League manages to survive for another 4 years.
{{champion:421}}

> {{champion:37}}  937 days

I'm being greedy here but, fingers crossed for a legendary or an awesome epic skin i_i

> [{quoted}](name=Nylisa,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=28lqub4V,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-09-04T06:11:51.886+0000)
>
> I'm being greedy here but, fingers crossed for a legendary or an awesome epic skin i_i

sona already has an ultimate and legendaries main draw is the vo (which they dont want to give her)

I'm sorry i am not sure what you mean by "legendaries main draw is the vo" but I am aware that she has an ultimate, i just wouldn't mind having  another high tier skin. i don't think any of us would when it comes to our favorite champions.

> [{quoted}](name=Nylisa,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=28lqub4V,comment-id=000200020000,timestamp=2018-09-05T18:57:36.314+0000)
>
> I'm sorry i am not sure what you mean by "legendaries main draw is the vo" but I am aware that she has an ultimate, i just wouldn't mind having  another high tier skin. i don't think any of us would when it comes to our favorite champions.

a legendary for the most part has the same tier of vfx as a 1350 skin

the draw is the fully redone animations (which dj sona already covers) and a whole new voice over

Ah i see yes that is true.however i never noticed Riot stating anywhere that it's either one or the other (either ultimate or legendary) one might say they don't have to, but we do not have too many champions with ultimate to be absolutely sure about this. even number of legendary skins are small compared to how big the roster is. this is just a pattern that emerged because many of the champions lack both of those. 
Im almost sure we are going to see both tiers for more...popular champions sooner or later.
Considering she has an Ultimate, it's kind of a low hope of her to see a Legendary (as they usually get one or the other)

From what i gathered from Riot's recent interviews. process of making one skin does not hinder process of another skin. elementalist lux took them 9 months to make but that didnt stop them from releasing other skins in that period of time. im not sure how they divide their time between the skins but i highly doubt having both skins is out of the question for any champion. 

just a wild guess but i think Ahri will be the first one in that path. she already has a legendary but she is one of the most popular characters who do not have an Ultimate yet! MF got hers ,Ezreal had his Lux as well.

Never said they hindered making another skin. I said, that because they have one type of High Tier skin it's unlikely there'd be another. None of the champs that have Ultimates have legendaries and none of the champs with legendaries have Ultimates..
forgive me but i never said you stated such a thing. i'm just sharing my thoughts on the matter and why i think it's a possibility for it to happen.
She's a common pick among Egrills so I wouldn't be surprised Riot does so to milk more money out of them.
Well, I dunno.  They did end up giving Darius 2 modern Legendaries, so anything is possible at this point.  Though I still think the next skin for her will only be a 1350.

The second Darius skin isn't that special since Cho'gath already had two legendaries. Yeah, Gentleman Cho is only a legendary by name and doesn't hold up to other skins but it's worth mentioning.

Sona's probably going to get a Star Guardian skin, though since Riot realized the stupid amounts of cash they can milk out of their fangirls by over-saturating a once-neat concept.

No hate toward starguardian but i think we already have enough of it. and star guardian Sona would have nothing special to offer unless they up the theme and give it something completely new... or make another ultimate which is impossible. imagine if a champion get second ultimate.community would go nuts!

Yeah, I'm not in favor of the idea either.

Probably still gonna happen though because people are so engrossed with Star Guardians.

So does Trist, but again, they aren't both MODERN. Darius' on the other hand has 2 modern legendaries, where both have new voice over, new animations (recalls, joke, taught, homeguards, ect), new effects, new sounds. Full immersion into the champion theme for that skin. 

Cho's only got new voice over, they lack a lot of the other things that even make a legendary now, as does Trist's first Legendary (which is closer to a 1350 now)
A fan can only hope right? i'd be happy with a common skin as well.
She was in the WAD files a while back.  I'm thinking she's gonna be in Star Guardian this year.
I personally hope it't not star guardian and if it is its better be good. a unique skin or a skin that is part a new line would be awesome.
What about best waifu {{champion:421}} ?
Oops! Your right, my bad. Exel file got messed up a bit.

I'm already tracking on what champions have gone without a skin since their most recent skin.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/zBlPEwf6-champions-that-are-due-for-a-skin

I think Sona is definitely going to be in the Star Guardian lineup this year. She's a very popular champion, but they've waited this long in between skins, so it has to be something big. Plus, Star Guardian would fit her **so** well.

I mean there were rumors and news of files for her and so it's not impossible to think that maybe her next skin could be Star Guardian. But as far as my knowledge goes, I never saw her as popular in the game. Course that could be me just not playing for a while and moreso with this PAX/ Rioter situation.

Yeah there were WAD file updates to her found, though at the time people thought it was referencing her Guinn Chroma. But when you think about how none of the others that got chromas for that event had WAD updates, it's pretty safe to say Sona was for an upcoming new skin.

I know you personally count team skins, but I like to make the note that {{champion:154}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:13}} would be on the list too if you don't count them, which the skins team allegedly doesn't.

Especially Kali since she only has her release skin and two esports skins.

> [{quoted}](name=QMighty,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=28lqub4V,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-09-04T18:05:31.082+0000)
>
> I know you personally count team skins, but I like to make the note that {{champion:154}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:13}} would be on the list too if you don't count them, which the skins team allegedly doesn't.
> 
> Especially Kali since she only has her release skin and two esports skins.

Yeah, this is true of me and if I didn't have that rule, they would be higher up.

And it's a shame for Kalista since she, as you said, has only gotten team or championship skins since her release. But considering how she's somewhat a pain in gameplay overall it may be a while (or until we ask Riot enough).
Spaghettilord {{champion:82}} when

I've been hoping for a RPG skin for Udyr where each of his stance is a different class. Like rouge for tiger, knight for turtle, barbarian for bear and mage for phoenix. Could work a a 750rp skin but would be nice if it was higher price for extra flairs.

Nah fk that we need 12 more lux skins to satisfy the masses
((Oops i broke a rule i'm not supposed to post until 2:30 as i am a male))
